Rulings.Edison:
●If “Black Potan” is removed from the field while being treated as a Tuner, you don't gain any Life Points.
●If a Monster Token being treated as a Tuner is removed from the field, you gain Life Points.
●If a Tuner monster that is equipped to “Relinquished” is removed from the field, you don't gain Life Points because it was not being treated as a monster.

Rulings.Base: 1. If "Black Potan" is removed from the field while being treated as a Tuner, you do not gain any Life Points.\n2. If a Monster Token being treated as a Tuner is removed from the field, you gain Life Points.\n3. If a Tuner monster that is equipped to "Relinquished" is removed from the field, you do not gain Life Points because it was not being treated as a monster.

PSCT.Base: If you control a face-up Tuner monster, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. When a face-up Tuner monster(s) you control is removed from the field, gain 800 Life Points.
